basic.description:
Advanced user-interface styles such as eye-tracking input, digital desks, wearable computing, ubiquitous and context-aware computing, and tangible interfaces.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Advanced User Interface Design

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    CISC325 or permission of the School
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from CISC425; CMPE425
